hr.p: Please click "More Info" for a link to all District Forms, including handbooks, the updated school calendar, district policies, and more.

div.p: Click here to view schedules for the elementary, junior high, and high school baseball and softball teams.
Click here to view schedules for the elementary, junior high, and high school basketball teams.
Click here to view schedules for the junior high and high school volleyball teams.
Now accepting applications for a full-time custodian. Apply at the Superintendent's Office. Please call 918.682.0371 if you have any questions.

A safe, encouraging, and fun learning environment for all students and our community; creating productive citizens who will make differences now and tomorrow.
WE ARE ‘STANG NATION!
